Welcome to Dunamis Community and Outreach Ministries, where we are inspired by the powerful message of Acts 1:8: "But you will receive power when the Holy Spirit comes on you; and you will be my witnesses in Jerusalem, and in all Judea and Samaria, and to the ends of the earth." At Dunamis, we are a vibrant community, empowered by the Spirit of God, committed to sharing the transformative love of Christ with everyone we encounter. We believe that through the Holy Spirit, we are equipped and energized to make a significant impact in our community and beyond.

Our mission is simple yet profound: to love God and love people. At Dunamis, we strive to create an environment where everyone feels welcomed and valued. Our worship services are filled with passionate praise, heartfelt prayer, and inspiring messages that connect God's Word to our everyday lives. We are dedicated to fostering deep and meaningful relationships with one another, and we aim to be a beacon of hope and love in our community.

We invite you to join us and experience the dynamic presence of God in a community that truly cares. Whether you are seeking a place to grow spiritually, form lasting friendships, or make a difference in the world, Dunamis is here for you. Together, let's embrace the power of the Holy Spirit, live out our faith boldly, and share the love of Christ with all those around us. Welcome to Dunamis â€“ we can't wait to see what God will do in and through you!

Service Times

Welcome to Dunamis Community and Outreach Ministries! We are delighted to have you join us as we come together in faith, fellowship, and service. Our weekly gatherings are designed to inspire, uplift, and strengthen your spiritual journey. Below is our schedule of services and events:

Sunday Service

10:30am and 4:00pm

Tuesday Prayer

6:00-7:00pm

Wednesday Bible Study

6:00-7:30pm

Directions

Dunamis is located at 1079 Matanzas St, Lake Helen, FL 32744

Directions from I-4

Take Exit 114 for FL-472. If you are coming from eastbound (Orlando direction), turn right onto FL-472. If you are coming from westbound (Daytona Beach direction), turn left onto FL-472. Drive on FL-472 for approximately 0.8 miles. Turn right onto Dr Martin Luther King Jr Beltway. Continue on this road for 1.1 miles. Turn right onto Cassadaga Road. In one mile, turn left onto Matanzas Street. The church will be on your right.

Directions from Downtown Deland

Head westbound on FL-44 (New York Ave) for approximately 2.7 miles. Take a right at the intersection with S Kepler Rd. At the traffic circle, take the 2nd exit and stay on Dr Martin Luther King Jr Beltway. Turn left onto Cassadaga Rd. In one mile, turn left onto Matanzas Street. The church will be on your right.
